text: MR 774u <THrif gfearrut T /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tew5 4Rdev #1r TTHrf #A) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #1-5 &a 6, #acr-10, ERGT; 7f farcff 110 075 G-5 & 6,Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Guidelines/Consultancy/ 2020 No. 10.2.23 dated 20th July, 2020 [As per approval given by Chairman on File No. NHAI/11013/AEGIE/RFPDocu./2017-Part(1)] Sub:: Uniform policy to decide the deterrent action against the consulting firms/ key personnel NHAI has issued guidelines on "Deterrent penalty action against   defaulting consultants vide Matter: Technical   (97/2012) dated 17.04.2012 for a uniform approach, while  dealing with matters   related to Errors, Omissions & Commissions or Misconduct of Consultants. Further, vide NHAI policy guidelines no. 10.2.18/2019 dated 11.06.2019, it was decided to dispense with the committee of 3 CGMs & the respective CGM was to deal with such cases. 2 It has come to the notice that the different technical divisions are adopting different policies while deciding upon the extent of deterrent action against the consulting firms for proven misrepresentation of facts and fraudulent practices by the consulting firm/ personnel.
